root.name: Football Manager Handheld
root.description: Football Manager Handheld is the first ever game from the Football Manager series to be released on the PSP. As future releases incorporated years into the title, this game is equivalent to Football Manager 2006.GameplayDue to the hardware constraints posed by the PSP, many features were cut out from Football Manager 2006. These differences include:No multiplayer modeA maximum of 30 playable seasons in one gameA squad is limited to a maximum of 36 playersNo database editorNo 2D match engine LeaguesThe following leagues are available in Football Manager Handheld:England: English Premiership, Championship, League One, League Two, Blue Square PremierFrance: Ligue 1, Ligue 2Germany: Bundesliga 1, Bundesliga 2Netherlands: Eredivisie, Eerste DivisieItaly: Serie A, Serie BSpain: La Liga, Segunda División

similar_games.game: J-League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! 7 Euro Plus
